name: Cube Combat
description:
Cube Combat is a dungeon-crawling action game. You control a cube on a mission, to destroy every other cube in sight! While exploring a dungeon filled with chests, you face a large amount of enemy cubes, ready to strike you down.  You need to unlock new attacks to stay ahead of your foes!

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Player will look at mouse pointer

Left Mouse Button = Attack

Right Mouse Button = Dash (unlockable)

Q = Area attack (unlockable)

E = Shoot (unlockable)

Made by siannodel64

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
